game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is threatened by an ancient evil known as The Devourer. Players take on the role of a Timekeeper, tasked with repairing the timestream and defeating The Devourer before it's too late.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate future where humanity has been eradicated. The player is awoken by an enigmatic figure known as The Architect, who sets them on their quest to repair time.
game.ending: Ultimately, the player must face The Devourer in a final showdown. Depending on the choices made throughout the game, the ending can vary: either The Devourer is defeated and time is restored, or it consumes what's left of reality, plunging the world into eternal darkness.
